title: This font from Season 4 of Arrested Development?
content:
There was a joke on the new season of Arrested Development around a company called "Halliburton Teen". I'm trying to figure out what the font is. This ( [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/blambot/crater-face-bb/crater-face-bb/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130612012624/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/blambot/crater-face-bb/crater-face-bb/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/blambot/crater-face-bb/crater-face-bb/")) seems close, but the x-height is all off.

Any ideas?

Thanks!  
-Chris
